documents.document:
New Condo Launch The Padang at Pasir Panjang Road

The Padang, located at Pasir Panjang Road, with two closest MRT Station: Kent Ridge & Haw Par Villa, is sitting on a FREEHOLD land of 102,366 sqft. The Padang is a low-rise luxury condominium with unit built-up area ranging from 882 sqft to 1,625 sqft.

The 148 units within the low rise condominium project will look into the central padang and 50-metre lap pool, children’s pool and deck, Clubhouse, Gym, and Strolling path.

The Padang is designed on an 8,000 sqft lawn that is tilted towards the pool, as if to draw attention towards the body of water. This is a great place for residents to get together while their children take a dip in the pool.

Another great gathering place is the Clubhouse, where residents can do workout and beat a path to the gym. The children have a nice play area while the adults could take an easy walk along the strolling path. The Padang is an ideal place in which to catch up with old friends or to make new ones.

The Padang is minutes drive to One North, NUS & Science Park. It is also minutes walk to West Coast Park & recreation facilities. With its close proximity to the Integrated Resort/ Sentosa/ Vivocity, the residents will save time travelling to these recreation & shopping places.

Visit: The Padang @ Pasir Panjang for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

The Whitley Residences By Hoi Hup

The long awaited Freehold landed residential development The Whitley Residences (Former Whitley Heights) is finally set to launch.

This luxurious modern Freehold landed residential development is located at Singapore prestigious Whitley estate with a huge site area of more than 100,000sqft.

This development is sitting on the site previously known as Whitley Heights which consists of 45 units of 3 storey walk-up apartments.

It is one of the largest freehold plot located in the prime district 9, 10 and 11 to be sold for its mixed landed residential development potential. Although the site currently houses a condominium, it is zoned for two-storey mixed landed houses upon redevelopment.

In terms of transportation, The Whitley Residences is near to 3 MRT stations. The Novena MRT is about 0.9km away. The Toa Payoh MRT is about 1.4km away. The Newton MRT is about 1.5km away.

The residents of Whitley Residences will enjoy close proximity to Orchard/Novena Shopping Belt, Balestier food haven, Newton Food Center, the charm of Thomson Road fine dining & the nature of Matritchie Reservoirs. The Novena Square, United Square shopping malls are about 1km away only. It takes about 5mins drive to reach these shopping malls.

For schools, the Catholic Junior College, the Balestier Hill Secondary School & Anglo Chinese (Barker Road Campus) School are all within 1km to The Whitley Residences.
Students and parents will save the travel time to schools.

Former Whitley Heights sold to Hoi Hup Realty for $159 million or $1,222psf of land area. The final sale price of $159 million or $1,222psf announced is slightly below that target. More than 80% of the owners have consented in writing to Hoi Hup’s offer.

Hoi Hup can build as many as 80 strata terrace houses or around 60 strata semi-detached houses for The Whitley Residences.

Hoi Hup Realty Pte Ltd, a veteran and dynamic property developer who has since completed over 900 quality homes and currently has a pipeline of more than 500 private residential units at different stages of development.

Hoi Hup sell-out projects and close to sell-out projects including The Ford @ Holland, Suites @ Cairnhill, Waterford Residence, Vacanza @ East, The Foresta @ Mt Faber, Sea Esta, The Miltonia Residences indicated that their developments were well-received by the market.

An eye for quality and years of construction experience in the industry, Hoi Hup's people have gained knowledge of the properties they develop. This valuable knowledge enables them to increase their effectiveness and to deliver a high level of quality and innovative products to their home buyers.

For The Whitley Residences details info, visit: The Whitley Residences for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

The MKZ @ Mackenzie Road

An interesting development in District 9 was recently launched, called The MKZ. Situated on the precious coveted land of Mackenzie road, The MKZ is a small cozy development consisting of 42 units. Strategically located in the heart of the city, travelling to Central Business District (CBD), Orchard and Bugis is a breeze. Nearest MRT includes not one but two, namely Little India and Newton which are within walking distance from the condo.

For The MKZ residents who drive, easy access to CTE, ECP and PIE is a great appeal. Marina Bay Financial Centre (MBFC) is only 10 minutes drive away while the Orchard shopping paradise is reachable within 15 minutes drive.

Apart from its prestigious address, it's also near top schools such Singapore Management University (SMU) and Nanyang Academy of Fine Arts (NAFA).

Zooming into the architectural aspect, The MKZ is designed with simplicity yet not compromising on the elegance. Shady palms and surrounding greenery send a serenity appeal as you stroll along the water features enjoying the tranquility with your family and friends.

Quality finishing and branded appliances are fitted in every unit. Every single detail in The MKZ is carefully thought and crafted. Sling doors and windows are featured with laminated glass for better sound insulation. Kitchen cabinets, wardrobes and hot water supply are provided for. Master, junior and common bathrooms are laid with marble wall tiles.

The unit types available at The MKZ are 1+1, 2, 3 or 4 bedrooms, appealing to a wide range of residents.

A gem as it is, it comes with an additional bonus; this is a freehold development. More details can be found at The MKZ @ MacKenzie.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

EON SHENTON @ Singapore Central Business District

Located at the prestigious address of 70 Shenton Way, EON Shenton is an integrated development consisting of shops, offices and residential units. Standing tall in the Central Business District at a height of 32 storeys, EON Shenton promises an exciting live, work and play lifestyle with breathtaking unblocked views of the city & sea.

EON Shenton comes with Hotel-Style Facilities. Imagine working or living in a majestic development with resort-living ambience, elegant landscaping & hotel-style facilities. 3 luxurious sky decks offers recreation with breathtaking unblocked views of the city skyline and sea. EON Shenton is set to shape the future of live, work and play.

The address of EON Shenton is at 70 Shenton Way, Singapore (Former Marina House). The developer is 70 Shenton Pte Ltd (Roxy-Pacific Holdings Ltd, Fission Group, Macly Capital, Pinnacle Assets and Chee Hsian Sing). The Architect is Ronny Chin Architects. The EON Shenton tenure is 99 years from Oct 2011. The expected TOP date is 2016 (No later than Dec 2019).

There are total of 253 units in this development. Shops: 23 units. Offices: 98 units (7th to 13th, 15th to 21st). Residential: 132 units (23rd to 32nd storey). There will be 3 Sky Terraces in total. At 6th, 14th & 22nd storey (Hotel-style facilities) accessible to office & residential users.

At EON Shenton, the sky is the limit. Invigorate your senses at the sky terraces and be on top of the world with a function room that provides camaraderie for private parties, social and business functions. To perfect the experience of absolute lavishness, a sky viewing deck and remarkable water garden provides indulgence set against the backdrop of the alluring cityscape.

EON Shenton provides you with a myriad of hotel-class facilities to meet and entertain your clients: A stylish 22nd storey Meeting Room, Bar Counter, Sky Lounge & more.

We look at the plans by Urban Redevelopment Authority, less than 10 years ago, to transform Marina Bay into a vibrant Waterfront City, and what we have and see at Marina Bay today. With the current construction of Singapore International Cruise Terminal, Marina Coastal Expressway and other strong developments around Tanjong Pagar, we look at how the Economic Strategies Committee recommendation to transform Tanjong Pagar into the next Waterfront City will be. And why Eon Shenton will be Illuminating the Tanjong Pagar Waterfront in near future.

For siteplan & floorplan info, please visit: EON SHENTON for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

New Launch M66 @ Moonstone Lane Singapore

A marvelous freehold new launch, attractive 5-storey resort project certainly is the ultimate example of styling living. The attractive 1 Bedroom, 1+Study, 2 Bedroom, 3 Bedroom and Penthouses apartment offer laps of bliss your soul wants. Comprising primarily 70 suite by the enchanting Kallang Riverside, M66 offers efficiently spacious concept layout complete with top quality imported finishes together with fittings. Developer also made sure each and every home in M66 is well positioned to receive the utmost scenery that it can have.

Facilitated with swimming pool, gymnasium and play ground and in close proximity to Kallang River Park Connector, M66 has exactly what it's essential to keep yourself and your loved ones occupied for cooling down and restoration. Perspire yourself out in the high tech fitness center or have a cool regenerating swim that your body desperately desired after every challenging days work. M66 is a symbol and depiction that is ideal for your household healthy being and connection.

M66 is nicely situated at the City's border and next to Kallang River in the private and laid-back moonstone neighbourhood, M66 is in the proximity of any place you want to be. The park connector ready to allow the residents to relax, jog, stroll leisurely to the nearby neighbourhood.

In the center area of Singapore, M66 is only 5 mins journey to Orchard, Novena and Toa Payoh. Furthermore, featuring Potong Pasir train station only 12 minutes stroll away, you are within a few stops to Harbourfront, Dhoby Ghaut, Chinatown and also NEX where all department stores are found. A spot so accessible yet still have the calm and tranquil atmosphere majority do not possess.

In all, M66 comprises 70 residences of 1, 1+S, 2, 3 Bedroom and Penthouses with attractive preview offer. All unit will be fully equiped with Bosch brand refrigerator, washer cum dryer, built-in wardrobe & kitchen cabinet. The sanitary fittings are from renowned brand and exudes the quality of a luxurious home.

New homes priced between S$500,000 and S$1 million are still the most popular among Singaporean buyers, according to data from the URA (Urban Redevelopment Authority). A total of 3,361 units or 46.3 percent of all new residential transactions done in 1H2012 were found to fall within this category, up from 40.1 percent over the same period last year.

For M66 siteplan & floorplan info, please visit: M66 @ Moonstone Lane for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

New Condo Launch Gambir Ridge At Bartley Road

One of the most exciting residential launch in 2012, Gambir Ridge is located within the private and exclusive residential enclave just beside Bartley Road, a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood ideal as an escape for the hustle and bustle of work. This development by Singapore reputable developer Tiong Aik is surrounded with mainly low rise developments, which offers a spacious and open view.

Gambir Ridge residences can say goodbye to all the usual headaches associated with traffic or long travel time because it is just minutes to Bartley MRT, which is one stop from Serangoon MRT Interchange and just few stations away from town. Car owners will have easy access to major expressways like CTE, PIE & KJE could reach the Central Business District within a short drive.

Gambir Ridge uniquely designed with well spaced orientation between blocks to maximise every residential units view. Most units will enjoy either pool view, garden view or panoramic view of the unblocked surrounding. Fitted with lifestyle condo facilities, lush landscaping and greenery theme to create a feeling of serenity and tranquillity, you will be isolated from the hustle and bustle of the city life when you step back home into Gambir Ridge.

The residents of Gambir Ridge will be spoilt for choices of entertainment and shopping. There are also plenty of shopping and dining options at nearby malls such as NEX (1 MRT stop away), Heartland Mall (2 MRT stops away), Junction 8 (3 MRT stops away), Ang Mo Kio Hub (4 MRT stops away) and Compass Point (5 MRT stops away). All within 10 to 15 minutes travelling time.

From an investment point of view, Gambir Ridge which is near to the Paya Lebar Commercial Hub and Eunos Tech Park will also mean that there will be high rental yield and potential capital appreciation in the future. In terms of location, properties located near MRTs have always appreciated faster in value, and are also more price resilient in times of uncertainty. There are not many prime sites located near MRTs, and this is a rare opportunity. When something is rare, what do you think will happen to the price in the long run?

Not to forgot, the Gambir Ridge is within 1km to the top school Maris Stellar High School. Working parents with kids going to school will be spared the long travel time and traffic jam sending their children to school. This will save time and bring convenience to both parents and children.

Let’s be the few privileged one to own a luxurious unit at Gambir Ridge, a new landmark in the Bartley area that will elevate your lifestyle & wow your visitors.

Visit: www.the-gambir-ridge.com for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

Stellar RV New Launch At River Valley District 10

Stellar RV is a new Freehold development in the prime River Valley neighbourhood.

Stellar RV is a 7-storey Freehold Development of 120 luxurious residential units at River Valley Road under the Tanglin Planning Zone in prime district 10.

It is located just a short distance from Tiong Bahru MRT station and the famous shopping haven Orchard Road, you can indulge every aspect of your personality with quality shops, world-renowned nightlife and sumptuous dining options, all just a short trip away. Not to forget the ever popular Tiong Bahru Market which offers variety of local delicacies. With it's near proximity to vibrant night spot like Robertson Quay, Clarke Quay & Boat Quay, the demand from expats and city life lovers's rental will be enhanced.

Stellar RV modern façade is a beautiful sight with clean lines and contemporary design to create the most seamless synergy between nature and urban living. The sky pool and sky gym at the rooftop offers a bird eye view of the surrounding tranquil neighbourhood. The swimming pool is 27m in length. There is also a pool shower sun deck and BBQ Area. There is an air-conditioned gymnasium with water feature as well. There is no better way to relax and enjoy a leisure swim on top of the world.

Only the finest quality finishing will be provided in Stellar RV. Top brands leave their mark in the beautifully-designed Stellar RV, giving that ultimate contemporary feel that one desires. All fittings are using branded material which exudes the high quality elements.

Spend your free time and weekend to bond with loved ones over fun sporting activities or delicious dining. Shop to your heart’s content at nearby shops or simply chill out with a coffee at the nearby eateries that dot the charming neighbourhood.

The full address of Stellar RV is at 408 River Valley Road Singapore S248306. The expected TOP Date is 31 Dec 2017.

The Developer is ALLIANCE LAND PTE LTD. A joint development by NOBEL, FISSION & PINNACLE.

The Architect for Stellar RV is JGP Architecture (S) Pte Ltd. Stellar RV sits on a land plot size of approximately 2,053sqm (22,107sqft).

For Stellar RV floorplan info, please visit: Stellar RV for more information.

For latest updates on Singapore upcoming new property launches, please see www.developer-launch.com.

Stellar RV New Launch At River Valley District 10

The wonders of nature blend seamlessly with contemporary chic at the Shoreline Residences.

Boasting 16 luxurious landed terrace houses, this prestigious new development is strictly for families who enjoy the finer things in life. Developed by Goodlands Home Pte Ltd, the uniques feature of Shoreline Residence is the close proximity to the beach. This is like the Sentosa Cove in the Northen pinnacle of Singapore.

Located just a stone’s throw from Sembawang Beach, The Shoreline Residences offers a unique lifestyle that very few developments can match in Singapore’s concrete jungle. You can frolic on the beach and enjoy the wonders of the sea at the Beach with a few minutes away. Getting to the ever popular Sembawang park for an evening stroll is also a breeze. The Sembawang Park is only minutes walk from your luxurious abode.

The Shoreline Residences puts you close to not only nature but also modern conveniences. Enjoy all that life has to offer with major shopping centres all within a short ride from your home. The Shoreline Residences – an irresistible combination offering the best of both worlds.

This is an exclusive 16 Modern & Unique homes with Private Swimming Pool on the roof in the area. All units comes with private lift from 1st level to roof top for convenience & handicapped users friendly. There is Unique Skylight feature to bring lights from the roof into the house.

The Split level unique design to enhance space planning and family bonding. The Modern dry and wet kitchen concepts with spacious dining area. There are marble flooring for Living, Dining, Dry Kitchen ,Master Bath, Junior Master Bath, Bath & Powder room. All bedrooms come with attached bathrooms except guest & utility room.

There is private car porch for 2 cars parking for all units (subject to the car sizes). Plus 2 Family areas for family activities and gathering, walk in wardrobe for Master bedroom.

Shoreline Residences Development Summary as below:

Project Name: The Shoreline Residences I
Developer: Goodland Homes Pte Ltd (wholly-owned by Goodland Group Limited)
Address: 51-61 Inggu Road
Units: 6 Units. 3-Storey Terrace Dwelling Houses

Project Name: The Shoreline Residences II
Developer: Goodland Homes Pte Ltd (wholly-owned by Goodland Group Limited)
Address: 60-78 Wak Hassan Drive
Units: 10 Units. 3-Storey Terrace Dwelling Houses

Expected TOP: 31 Dec 2015 (Actual move in date can be as early as Nov 2012)
Carpark: 2 Lots per unit (depending on car size)
Type of Home Lift: Ken-jo Home Lift in hairline stainless steel finish (For 6 paxs)
Eligibility: Foreigners/PRs need to apply to Land Dealing Unit (LDAU).

For The Shoreline Residences I & II floorplan info, please visit: The Shoreline Residences for more information.

For latest updates on Singapore upcoming new property launches, please see www.developer-launch.com.

One Dusun Residences At Jalan Dusun (Off Balestier Road)

One Dusun Residences is a new Freehold condominium located along Jalan Dusun, off Balestier Road. Life at One Dusun Residences exceeds the pinnacle of the finest quality and let you indulge in the most coveted prestige, is truly an out-of-the-box living. Staying to its name, the architecture is a creation fused with energetic elements and modish ideals. Blending an assortment of extended balconies in varied dimensions, you get to enjoy living in one that suits your preference best.

One Dusun Residences is a distinctive 28 storey of 230 units is an architectural phenomenon that stands out in its vicinity of celebrated residences, stunningly captivating the sights of everyone even from the outside. It comes with 76 unit shops, Food & Beverage which provide ultimate convenience to all the residents.

At One Dusun Residences, taking off to anywhere in Singapore is a breeze. In just minutes, you are at the Toa Payoh MRT/Bus Interchange and Novena MRT Station to travel to any destination. Ease, stone’s throw away, close proximity – all these describe the satisfaction of living in The Verve. With the easily accessible Central Expressway (CTE), Pan Island Expressway (PIE) and travel routes linking to the City and popular avenues for hangout, you have the freedom to go to places in a short drive.

For schools, the Catholic Junior College, the Balestier Hill Secondary School & Anglo Chinese (Barker Road Campus) School are all within short distance to One Dusun Residences. Students and parents of One Dusun Residences will save the travelling time to schools.

The residents of One Dusun Residences will enjoy close proximity to Orchard/Novena Shopping Belt, Balestier food haven, Newton Food Center, the charm of Thomson Road fine dining & the nature of Matritchie Reservoirs. The Novena Square, United Square shopping malls are about 1km away only. It takes about 5mins drive to reach these shopping malls.

Not to forget the nearby Zhong Shan Park is under construction now. As the name Zhong Shan Park suggests, it is named after the Sun Yat Sen in Chinese. The site is zoned as hotel site, having gross floor area of 425,942 square feet, which can potentially yield some 675 hotel rooms. 4,844 square feet of space in the public park can be used for outdoor refreshment areas and tea pavilions.

Given the excitement commencing at the Zhong Shan Park, it is no surprise that the property at the area has been excelling in its transactions. Not to forget that Balestier Road is also known for its delicious local fares, such as Tau Sar Pia and Bak Kut Teh, that are tucked away in shophouses that line the road.

For One Dusun Residences details info, visit: One Dusun Residences for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see www.developer-launch.com.

Skies Miltonia At Miltonia Close

The Skies Miltonia is an upcoming new condo launch by reputable TG Development. Located beside Orchid Golf & Country Club near Miltonia Close, The Skies Miltonia will features more than 350 residential units plus limited townhouses, many of which enjoy spectacular views of the golf course and the tranquil reservoir.

Sited on a large piece of land, Skies Miltonia is a resort-themed condo that offers great facilities & landscaping. Pools, water features and lushly landscaped gardens surround the condo. Soak in the restful and relaxing atmosphere and enjoy the beautiful scenery of the golf course & tranquil reservoir.

Skies Miltonia is near to Yishun Town. The nearby Yishun Town Centre will be transformed. With the Northpoint Shopping Centre extension completed, residents can look forward to a proposed integrated mixed-use development with bus interchange at Yishun Central. In addition, there will be a community plaza with improved pedestrian mall and a heritage corner where the history of Yishun will be showcased.

At Skies Miltonia, taking off to anywhere in Singapore is a breeze. In just minutes, you are at the Yishun MRT/Bus Interchange to travel to any destination. With the easily accessible Central Expressway (CTE), Seletar Expressway (SLE) and travel routes linking to the City and popular avenues for hangout, you have the freedom to go to places in a short drive.

For parents and students, the Skies Miltonia is near to a number of schools. Northbrook Secondary School is approx 500m away. The Northland Primary School is approx 750m away. And Chung Cheng High School at Yishun is approx 1.4 km away.

For Skies Miltonia investor, the nearby Seletar Aerospace Park will be the major value booster. Seletar Aerospace Park is a world-class industrial park set within Singapore's charming historic aviation landmark.

It is an integrated and efficient plug-and-play industrial space for a wide range of aerospace activities from aerospace Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul (MRO), design and manufacturing of aerospace systems and components to business and general aviation activities such as a training campus for pilots, aviation professionals and technical personnel. Skies Miltonia will appeal to the professionals working in this world class aerospace hub.

The Skies Miltonia site at the junction of Yishun Ave 1/ Miltonia Close received a top bid of $138.9m from TG Development and Master Contract Services. This site proved to be popular with developers as it garnered 8 bids.

TG Development and Master Contract Services past records includes boutique developments in Sentosa Cove, The Oliv and The Peak @ Cairnhill. All these are luxury developments with finest quality and exquisite design.

For Skies Miltonia latest launch updates, visit: Skies Miltonia for more information.

For additional information on the Upcoming Projects, please see Singapore Property Launch Updates.

The Skies Miltonia By TG Master Private Limited

A new launch at the tranquil Miltonia Close, the Skies Miltonia will features 420 residential condo units including 10 townhouses. There will be 2 shops unit to cater to the convenience of the residents. Skies Miltonia will have 8 blocks of 13 storey condo unit. Many of these units will enjoy spectacular views of the golf course and the tranquil reservoir. Skies Miltonia is expected to launch in 3rd quarter of 2012.

Sited on a 181,910sqft huge land, Skies Miltonia is a resort-themed condo that offers great facilities & landscaping. The residents in this luxurious condo will be spoilt with many lifestyles facilitis. Among the proposed facilities includes Arrival Plaza, Shuttle Bus Waiting Area, Bucida Garden, 50m Lap Pool,Children’s Pool, Splash Pad, Pool Deck, Wet Lounge, Water Spa Gardenwith Jacuzzi Jets, Cloud Pavilion, Alfresco Terrace, Clubhouse Function Room, 4 x BBQ Pavilion, 1 x Tennis Court, Jogging Track, Sky Gym, Outdoor Fitness Station, Children’s Play Area.

Skies Miltonia is near to Khatib & Yishun Town. With the Northpoint Shopping Centre extension completed, the residents can look forward to a proposed integrated mixed-use development with bus interchange at Yishun Central. In addition, there the nearby Khoo Teck Puat hospital will create a great demand for future tenants at Skies Miltonia.

The Skies Miltonia expected unit mix includes 1bedroom, 2bedroom, 3bedroom, 4bedroom, 3 & 4bedroom Penthouses and Townhouses. This development will appeal to singles, family or investors. The indicative pricing for 1 bedroom unit is estimated to be from $4xxk, 2 bedroom unit from $6xxk, 3 bedroom unit from $8xxk, 4 bedroom unit from $1.3xmil, the penthouses unit from $1.9xmil, the luxurious townhouses from $3.6mil.

For Skies Miltonia investor, the nearby Seletar Aerospace Park will help to increase it's capital appreciation. Seletar Aerospace Park is a world-class industrial park set within Singapore's charming historic aviation landmark.

The Skies Miltonia site at the junction of Yishun Ave 1/ Miltonia Close received a top bid of $138.9m from TG Development and Master Contract Services. This site proved to be popular with developers as it garnered 8 bids. TG Development and Master Contract Services past records includes boutique developments in Sentosa Cove, The Oliv and The Peak @ Cairnhill. All these are luxury developments with finest quality and exquisite design.

The completion of Skies Miltonia is expected in Dec 2016. In all, Skies Miltonia presents a new glistening star at Singapore Yishun enclave, to draw the attention of every passerby. With an elevated terrain advantage, the inclined height gives rise to units with scenic views as they overlook the beauty of the development’s wide expanse, Golf Course and Reservoir.

For The Skies Miltonia latest launch updates and floor plan info, please visit: Skies Miltonia for more information.

For information on the upcoming Projects, please see Singapore Property Launch Updates.
